ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Someone take me under their wing!
ygData.msgSnippet: I was wondering if anyone knows if there is a way to request one of these keys? I have an EQ acount already, but I believe it must have been inactive when they
ygData.messageBody:
I was wondering if anyone knows if there is a way to
request one of these keys? I have an EQ acount
already, but I believe it must have been inactive when
they first sent the buddy keys out. I recently
re-subscribed at the first of June, so I'm not sure
when these keys came out. I was kind of hoping to get
one for my sister. :)

Thanks

--- Thomas Houseman <thomashouseman@...>
wrote:
> Hi Svetlana,
>
> I've sent you my "Share the game with a Buddy key"
>
> Good luck.
>
> I'm on the Drinal server if that helps.
>
>
> Rgds,
>
> T.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Svetlana
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Sent: Monday, June 21, 2004 5:08 PM
> Subject: [EverQuest] Someone take me under their
> wing!
>
>
> hello :)
>
> I'm completely new to EQ but absolutely
> fascinated. Dying to try it
> out. I read today that a mid-level player can let
> a friend play for
> free for about a month. It sounds great. I asked a
> friend on Icq but
> her account is paid for by someone else so that's
> out of the
> question.
> This probably looks very silly but I'm willing to
> take the risk.
> Could someone please do this for me?
> I'm loyal and trustworthy.
> Thanks :D
>
> The link is here:
>
>
http://eqlive.station.sony.com/news_section/newsview.jsp?story=62304
>
> ~Svetlana
> svetamethyst@...
